name: LoneLy (ehdumb)
description:
Theme: Alone

Constraints: Exploding Crabs and The Player Only Moves Left and Right

The game is a side-scrolling adventure where you need to attack these crabs in order to keep moving forwards, over the course of the game you will discover this area where you need to climb to the clouds and get a key to go back to the start to open the door. Only you will find out what's inside.

(Right arrow key is moving Right, Left arrow key is moving Left)

(Z is to jump and X is to kill the crabs)

When you get the key and make it back to the start, you have to press E on the door in order to complete the game.

Have Fun!
